doc:
Sam Costa https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Costa 0 Samuel Gabriel 'Sam' Costa (17 June 1910 – 23 September 1981) was a popular singer of the British dance band era and a voice actor on the show Much Binding in the Marsh. He was also a disc jockey for Radio Luxembourg and the BBC. Samuel_Gabriel_'_Sam_'_Costa ( 17_June_1910 – 23_September_1981 ) was a_popular_singer of the_British_dance_band_era and a_voice_actor on the_show_Much_Binding in the_Marsh . He was also a_disc_jockey for Radio_Luxembourg and the_BBC .
